alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 3:48PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calhoun and northeastern Aransas Counties through 415 PM CST... At 348 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Copano Village, or over Rockport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockport, Lamar, Holiday Beach, Key Allegro, Copano Village and Fulton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas
